title: Greater Vision Totem Bug - Changes Your Ward Skin
body:
1. Select a ward skin in the shop (Ex. Poro Ward)
2. Start a game and buy item "Warding Totem"
3. Upgrade "Warding Totem" to {{item:3362}}  when you reach level 9
4. Buy a "Vision Ward" from the shop
5. Place you "Vision Ward" down first, it will use the ward skin you selected at the beginning of the game (Poro Ward) then use your {{item:3362}} and place down a ward the ward skin will be changed. (If you selected Poro Ward at the beginning of the game the ward skin from  {{item:3362}}   will be Battlecast Ward.)
